languages.text: {n}Мейв открывает глаза и тут же порывисто вскакивает, увидев окровавленный труп. Она сжимает руки на груди, глаза наливаются слезами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Резко очнувшись от громкого звука, Лидзи встречается взглядом с остекленевшими глазами трупа.{/n} "Брат..."
traits.speaker: FW_Lizzy

languages.text: {n}Maive opens her eyes and immediately jumps to her feet at the sight of the bloodied corpse. She clenches her hands on her chest, and her eyes well up.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мейв открывает глаза и тут же порывисто вскакивает, увидев окровавленный труп. Она сжимает руки на груди, глаза наливаются слезами.{/n}

languages.text: {n}梅芙睁开眼睛，看到眼前鲜血淋漓的尸体，立刻跳了起来。她双手紧紧握在胸前，泪水从眼眶里涌了出来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive opens her eyes and immediately jumps to her feet at the sight of the bloodied corpse. She clenches her hands on her chest, and her eyes well up.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}梅芙睁开眼睛，看到眼前鲜血淋漓的尸体，立刻跳了起来。她双手紧紧握在胸前，泪水从眼眶里涌了出来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}メイヴは目を開け、血まみれの死体を見てすぐに立ち上がる。彼女は胸の上で手を握りしめ、目に涙を溜める。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive opens her eyes and immediately jumps to her feet at the sight of the bloodied corpse. She clenches her hands on her chest, and her eyes well up.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}メイヴは目を開け、血まみれの死体を見てすぐに立ち上がる。彼女は胸の上で手を握りしめ、目に涙を溜める。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maive abre los ojos y se pone en pie de un salto al ver el cadáver ensangrentado. Se lleva las manos al pecho y sus ojos se llenan de lágrimas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive opens her eyes and immediately jumps to her feet at the sight of the bloodied corpse. She clenches her hands on her chest, and her eyes well up.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive abre los ojos y se pone en pie de un salto al ver el cadáver ensangrentado. Se lleva las manos al pecho y sus ojos se llenan de lágrimas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gözlerini açan Maive, kanlı cesedi görünce hemen ayağa fırlıyor. Ellerini göğsünde kenetliyor, gözleri doluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive opens her eyes and immediately jumps to her feet at the sight of the bloodied corpse. She clenches her hands on her chest, and her eyes well up.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gözlerini açan Maive, kanlı cesedi görünce hemen ayağa fırlıyor. Ellerini göğsünde kenetliyor, gözleri doluyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maive ouvre les yeux et se relève d'un bond à la vue du cadavre ensanglanté, puis serre les mains sur sa poitrine tandis que les larmes lui montent aux yeux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive opens her eyes and immediately jumps to her feet at the sight of the bloodied corpse. She clenches her hands on her chest, and her eyes well up.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive ouvre les yeux et se relève d'un bond à la vue du cadavre ensanglanté, puis serre les mains sur sa poitrine tandis que les larmes lui montent aux yeux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maive öffnet die Augen und springt sofort auf, als sie die blutige Leiche erblickt. Sie ballt die Fäuste vor der Brust, und ihre Augen füllen sich mit Tränen.{/n}
